title: The House We Grew Up In
description: The unforgettable story about a family with a secret at its core, from Top Ten bestseller Lisa Jewell, author of Ralph's Party, The Making of Us and Before I Met You.Picture a picture-book cottage in a village. A family in a sun-drenched kitchen filled with love and laughter.Picture an Easter weekend when tragedy strikes – so unexpected, so devastating that no one can talk about it.The years pass; the children become adults. Gradually they lose touch as the secret between them tears them apart.And then something happens that calls them back to the house they grew up in – and to what really happened that Easter weekend all those years ago.
author: Lisa Jewell
